text: The spangled cichlid (Acaronia vultuosa) is a species of cichlid found throughout the Orinoco Basin, including the Casiquiare, Inírida River, and the Vichada River, as well as the Rio Negro. This species can reach a length of TL. It inhabits the waters close to the bank that are rich in vegetation, and preys on smaller fish. ==References== Category:Cichlasomatini Category:Fish described in 1989
title: Acaronia vultuosa
